pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ribosome Profiling Data Analysis: from BAM to Data Representation and Interpretation // Starting with a BAM file, this package provides the necessary functions for quality assessment, read start position recalibration, the counting of reads on CDS, 3'UTR, and 5'UTR, plotting of count data: pairs, log fold- change, codon frequency and coverage assessment, principal component analysis on codon coverage.
